articles.title: Gut microbiome remodeling induced by microplastic exposure in humans.
articles.summary: Microplastic exposure in humans alters gut microbiome composition, potentially increasing risks of gastrointestinal diseases and changing bacterial diversity.

articles.title: The colloidal stability of albumin-based drug delivery systems has a profound effect on tumoricidal activity.
articles.summary: By enhancing the surface charge and colloidal stability of albumin-based nanoparticles, researchers developed a more effective paclitaxel drug delivery system with improved tumor targeting.

articles.title: Killing cancer takes guts: lessons learned from the manipulation of gut microbiome and immunotherapy for the future of urothelial carcinoma.
articles.summary: Specific gut bacteria can enhance immunotherapy effectiveness for urothelial carcinoma by boosting the immune system's ability to fight cancer.

articles.title: Effects of estradiol, tamoxifen, and raloxifene on human temporal lobe cortex astroglial cell spreading.
articles.summary: Estrogen-related compounds influence how brain support cells (astrocytes) spread and change shape, potentially impacting neural connectivity.
